headline: Invesco Main Street Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Underperformance mainly resulted from stock selection in health care and communication services. Consumer discretionary led all sectors. Read more here.

headline: Invesco Dividend Income Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The fund is balanced across sectors and industries, with a focus on long-term growth areas and companies with sustainable free cash flow and healthy balance sheets.

raw.headline: Invesco Dividend Income Fund Q4 2024 Commentary

headline: Invesco Diversified Dividend Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Fund outperformed the Russell 1000 Value Index primarily due to strong stock selection in information technology, while health care, particularly managed health care and pharma detracted.

raw.headline: Invesco Diversified Dividend Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
raw.summary: Fund outperformed the Russell 1000 Value Index primarily due to strong stock selection in information technology, while health care, particularly managed health care and pharma detracted.

headline: Invesco Comstock Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Stock selection in communication services, financials and materials added to relative results. Stock selection in health care and consumer staples were the largest detractors.

raw.headline: Invesco Comstock Fund Q4 2024 Commentary

headline: Dividend Income: Lanny's January 2025 Summary
summary: Pepsi is growing by a significant amount, due to buying more shares, dividend increases and dividend reinvestment. Click to read.
